title: Web Developer
description:
The ideal candidate is a creative problem solver who will work in coordination with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and maintain our next generation websites and web tools. You must be comfortable working as part of a team while taking the initiative to take lead on new innovations and projects.

Responsibilities
• Revise, edit, proofread & optimize web content
• Work with cross-functionally to enhance overall user experience of our platforms
• Own various design tasks involved in the web development life cycle from start to finish

Qualifications
• At least 1 - 2 years' of experience using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
• Proficiency in at least one server-side technology (Java, PHP, Python)
• Ability to multi-task, organize, and prioritize work

Job Types: Full-time, Regular / Permanent

Salary: ₹12,000.00 - ₹25,000.00 per month

Schedule
• Flexible shift
• Night shift
• Rotational shift

title: Web Developer Intern (Remote)
description:
MonetizeMore builds industry-leading ad technology that is seen by more than 300M+ people per month. The company has been running for 12 years achieving consistent double-digit growth each year with a team of 280+ team members spread across the globe. MonetizeMore offers location and schedule freedom to every one of its team members. That means that you would have the lifestyle autonomy to choose to work from anywhere in the world, during the time of day you prefer. This new-age work lifestyle would enable you to engineer your ideal lifestyle. Say goodbye to endless commutes, stuffy business attire, and the arbitrary 9 to 5 work-day. Take your life back into your hands by joining the MonetizeMore team! What you’ll do:

Developing features or products using: Node.js, JavaScript, Python/Flask, PostgreSQL, React.js, AWS, Linux, Docker, Git, Cloud Services and any other new technologies. Building web applications with user empathy. Developing APIs and integrating with 3rd party APIs to... automate manual tasks. Implementing UI facilitating third-party reporting and streamlining ad operations. Integration of services to maximize ad revenues and maintain strong user experience. Planning and prototyping new applications. Defect resolution of existing and new issues. Unit testing new features to ensure they conform to MonetizeMore’s quality standards and meet requirements. Code reviews. Running performance benchmarking tests. Staying up to date with new trends and advancements in web development and ad tech. Attending daily stand-up meetings (30 mins) and other Scrum meetings (Every 2 weeks). Who you are:

Open for junior developers, fresh graduates or graduating with at least 3-6 months or 1 year experience in Python, SQL and/or Javascript , HTML/CSS. Willing to work 40 hours a week.

Major related field and desiring a paid internship experience. Must have strong interpersonal and communication skills, verbal and written Eagerness and ability to learn quickly and expand technical expertise.

Excellent problem solving skills. Candidates must possess at least Bachelor's/College Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent Process: Reviewing of application (resume screening) > Testdome online examination > Culture-fit Interview > Final/Technical interview > Test Project What we offer:

Competitive Salary: Our salary formula adjusts to your cost of living and experience. Work remotely: Live and work wherever you like! Flexible working hours: You have the autonomy to set your own schedule Retreats: We meet in person for company get-togethers. Career Growth and Trainings

If you think you are a good fit. Please apply on this side bar and give specific reasons what sets you apart. We hire individuals, not robots so don’t be afraid to show a little personality. We make hiring decisions based on your experience, skills and passion. Please note that interviews are conducted virtually.

Powered by JazzHR

title: Senior Web Developer
description:
Web Developer

The web developer is an integral member of CyberArk’s marketing team, as you will be responsible for bringing CyberArk’s digital strategy to life across cyberark.com and our other digital touchpoints.

The right candidate for this position is a detailed, organized self-starter with experience and passion for building engaging digital experiences from concept to launch. Ideally looking for a web developer who has a passion for marketing and can incorporate strong design, B2B digital marketing best practices, and marketing technology expertise into their development projects. And equally important, you are willing to dive in to understand and solve problems.

Responsibilities:
• Maintain and update cyberark.com and our other digital properties
• Build engaging and interactive web pages in WordPress from PSDs and Figma files that are responsive and SEO friendly.
• Execute content updates on cyberark.com and other digital properties
• Manage digital projects from... scoping/requirements gathering, all the way through sign-off, QA, launch, and ongoing optimization.

Requirements
• 7+ year’s experience in front end web development with strong hand coding experience in HTML, CSS, and responsive design frameworks, WordPress PHP, JS, and jQuery.
• Experience updating a portfolio of websites.
• A strong eye for design and layout and web/mobile UI/UX.
• Proficient in using Photoshop, Illustrator and Figma.
• Ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects with complex business requirements.
• Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, high-growth environment with changing priorities.
• Well organized with a strong attention to details.
• Strong written and verbal communication skills.
• Resourceful team player with a growth mindset.

Nice to Have
• Experience with WPBakery Pagebuilder
• Experience with version control GIT
• Experience with optimizing pages for conversion and demand generation.
• Prior experience with maintaining and optimizing digital properties for SEO.
• Prior experience with website analytic tools (Adobe Analytics, GA4, Google Tag Manager, etc.,).
• Prior experience with instrumenting A/B tests and content targeting/personalization

title: Web Developer
description:
Web UI Developer

Job Summary

As a web UI developer at Autocash.ai, you will be part of our software development

team, working with a cross-functional team to create a cutting-edge cloud-based Fintech

solution.

Responsibilities:

● Mockup user-interface based on business requirements

● Design, code, and test web-based user interface

● Create and maintain technical documentation

● Integrate with back-end code base using Python, Restful API, Hasura GraphQL

etc.

● Ability to multi-task and prioritize

● Collaborate with both internal development teams as well as client users

● Deliver high-quality work product on time and on budget

● Ability to communicate complex technical concepts to audiences with a variety of

technical and non-technical understanding

● Keep up to date on trends in cloud-based web-applications

Requirements

● 2+ years of experience in Web Development

● Excellent knowledge of HTML, XML, CSS, jQuery/JavaScript

● Experience with Python, SQL, GraphQL... Hasura

● Experience with React JS, Angular or Vue

● Some experience with graphic software, such as Adobe Photoshop and XD

● Proven experience integrating APIs into web sites and applications

● Strong verbal and written communication skills

● Self-starter with sharp eye for detail

● Ability to manage and meet schedule deadlines

● Critical thinker and problem solver that can work independently

● Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or Computer Science or equivalent work

experience, a bonus

● Experience working directly with clients a bonus

● Work location: Hyderabad/Hybrid

● Time Shift: 50% overlap with US hours

About Us:

Autocash.ai is a US-based fintech startup company offering cloud-based data

analytics and automation software for the Corporate Finance department of our

clients. The software will transform the client’s cash, treasury and working capital

management processes. We are looking to build our software development team in

Hyderabad, India with a potential to expand to other locations worldwide.

We firmly believe that a product is as good as the people behind it. Whether it's

product development, customer support, sales or operations, all our employees see

the direct impact of their work. As one of the very promising Fintech software

companies, autocash.ai focuses on hiring talented and motivated people from diverse

backgrounds.

If you want to channel your ambition and drive for success, you will be a great fit with

us with an immense potential to grow

title: Web Developer
description:
Experienced Web Developer needed - Laravel and PHP

We are building a Laravel PHP-based program that manages timesheets, calculates payroll, invoices, manages employee paperwork, and more. We are looking to improve the system performance, add features and eventually introduce a mobile app.

If you have prior experience working on a SAAS application that will be a benefit.

You must be based in India, have a stable internet connection, and show proof of abilities.

This is a full-time hire with a monthly salary, not a contract hire.

Some of your day-to-day tasks will be:
• Create and maintain a features list based on business needs
• Participate in daily standup meetings to discuss coding progress
• Write code and participate in code reviews
• Ensure all components are tested thoroughly, maintain the staging site
• Have a willing attitude ready to take on new challenges
• Suggest changes to make the product better
• Willing to work responsibly and timely
• Establish and follow a... product roadmap

As you can see from the list of daily activities, they are all technical in nature and varied in job type. We are a distributed team working remotely so you must be self-motivated and responsible because you will not have a direct manager (immediately) to monitor you.

Prerequisites for this job:
• You should have 5 years of programming experience
• Knowledge of Laravel PHP is a must
• Knowledge of AWS is a big plus
• A good eye for design will be helpful
• Mobile app development would be another huge plus
• Be ready to work entirely remotely
• Be motivated to build out an entire system
• Based in India
• Open to feedback

You will be joining a small team of developers currently spread out all over the world. Most of the developers are working on the backend features.

If we move forward with your application the next steps will be:
• Answer follow-up questions about work experience
• Phone interviews
• Zoom, Google Meet, or Skype interviews
• Background check

title: Sr. Web Developer
description:
Profile: Senior Web Developer - Angular

Experience: 5+ years

Salary: INR 1,41,500/month (based on experience)

Expected Notice Period: 2 to 4 Weeks

Shift: US Partial Shift (4pm -1am IST)

Opportunity Type: Onsite (Hyderabad)

Placement Type: Direct Placement

(*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' clients)

About the Client/Company:

We are technologists at heart, who love what we do. At the company we believe in transparency, fairness, and collaboration while we passionately work on some of the toughest use cases in OTT video; and are enthusiastic about massive scale and agility. If you get excited about building the future of OTT video, and aspire to be part of a high-performing, learning-oriented, and caring culture--you have landed on the right company.

Our Client is Looking for:

Senior Web Developer - Angular who is passionate about their work, eager to learn and grow, and who is committed to delivering exceptional results. If you are a team player, with a positive... attitude and a desire to make a difference, then we want to hear from you!

Roles & Responsibilities
• Design & build applications for Browser apps - Chrome, Firefox, Safari by using Angular, React, Stencil Components
• Strong knowledge on web technologies
• Should be proactive to maintain the code quality and help improve the standards
• Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications

This Role Requires:
• 5+ years of experience working in Angular 11+, JavaScript, Typescript, HTML/HTML5 & CSS/CSS3
• Familiar with modern JavaScript development tools, frameworks, as well as JS runtimes.
• It would be plus to have Good knowledge on KaiOS Architecture, App Submission Guidelines and the kaiStore Submission process
• Proficient in handling responsive design, memory optimization and concepts
• Knowledge on progressive web apps
• Proficient in using RESTful APIs & JSON data

About Uplers

Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant direct placement onsite opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement. You will also be assigned to a dedicated Talent Success Coach during the engagement.

How to apply for this opportunity?
• Register or login on our portal & fill out the application
• Clear the assessment(s) required and apply for the opportunity
• Once completed, our team will contact you with an interview with our SME/Matcher
• Once it’s all done, your profile will be shared with the client
• When selected, just meet the client and get your exciting career started!

(Note: There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).

So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you

title: Web Designers
description:
Company Description

Crazy Web Designers was founded in 2016 providing web design, web development, app development, digital marketing, graphic designing and various services with the vision to provide IT services to make the enterprise more digitize and easier way to work and live.

Job Description

We are looking for a junior-level web designer/developer to assist the senior web team. In this role, you will build and maintain websites, microsites, landing pages, emails, ads, and digital campaigns. A successful candidate must have the ability to weave stories based on the data and troubleshoot on the fly. You must have experience designing for desktop, mobile and tablet, with a focus on the principals of digital design, website usability, imagery/graphics, and intuitive user experiences. Strong attention to detail and problem-solving skills are required.

Job Duties:

- Work with senior design team to design and build highly impactful UX solutions

- Own testing and optimization of... websites and creative campaigns

- Maintain website updates with new content, landing pages and templates

- Participate in various design/development phases from concept to completion

- Understanding of how to apply branding guidelines

- Maintain a consistent, organized Media Library/asset management

- Troubleshoot site and form issues

- Utilize Workfront software for record keeping and project management

- Responsible for following procedures, timelines, and deadlines for projects

- Continue to learn, explore, and evaluate new technologies, and grow professionally

Qualifications

- Comprehensive portfolio

- B.A/B.S preferred with minimum 2 years of experience as a web designer/developer; agency experience preferred but not required

- Experience with Creative Suite programs (e.g., Photoshop, Illustrator, etc.)

- Proficient in CMS systems, specifically WordPress sites (Ceros a plus)

- Good visual design sense with experience in the field of web design

- Experience in responding well to clients’ design requests

- Practical knowledge of color theory, typography, graphic design

- Strong communication skills and attention to detail

- Self-starter who can work on multiple projects simultaneously

- Be open to learning new systems and practices

- Research, explore and share any UI/UX trends, updates and relevant innovations

- Ability to work in a highly collaborative environment, including troubleshooting and problem resolution

Additional Information

Personal Qualities (as important as skills!)
■　Creative: You think outside the box. We want your ideas and feedback not only for the project and coding, but also for the whole company
■　Timely and committed: You manage well your time
■　Challenger: You like to push yourself and go beyond your own goals. We’re ambitious and we want you to be too!
■　Quality-driven: You create great work you’re proud of!
■　Fast learner: You’ll learn a lot with us, and we move fast!
■　Team player: You share, discuss, ask for advice, and report on your work on yourself. You’ll work independently, we don’t want to be on your back

title: Senior Web Developer
description:
The internet continues to develop exponentially, and remains on the cutting edge of exceptional website design. We’re looking for a skilled web developer to join our team of innovative designers who are consistently raising the bar for creativity and user experience. The ideal candidate is a talented artist who has extensive technical expertise and can work independently or with a team to create, maintain, and update client websites in a variety of industries. Proficiency with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and web applications and services is essential for succeeding in this role. The web developer will have an immediate impact on our brand and those of our clients, and will help solidify our industrywide reputation for stellar design.

Objectives of this role:
• Create well-designed and tested code using best practices for web development, including for responsive design and mobile display
• Create websites and interfaces using standard HTML/CSS practices, and incorporate data from back-end... databases and services
• Create and maintain workflows for teams, providing visibility and ensuring balance
• Develop or validate testing schedules that address all browsers and devices, ensuring web content can be accessed on any computer
• Maintain up-to-date knowledge of industry trends and technologies

Responsibilities:
• Meet regularly with stakeholders and managers to review business and functional requirements and to determine project scopes and specifications
• Develop and maintain operational systems, tools, and processes, and participate in tactical and strategic development projects
• Ensure software stability via regression, support quality assurance, and perform unit and user-acceptance testing to identify bugs
• Make small edits requested by customers, develop plans for completing larger projects, and suggest solutions to improve existing websites
• Perform UI design and coding and create reusable objects and wireframes for web pages and email templates
• Conduct file backups regularly to local directories

Required skills and qualifications:
• Dedication to innovative, sophisticated designs and collaborative problem-solving
• Experience in planning and developing websites across multiple products and organizations
• Extensive knowledge of web applications, programming languages, and web services — including API, CSS, CSS3, cross-browser compatibility, HTML, HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, security principles, REST, SOAP, and web user interface design
• Proficiency with content management systems, including WordPress and Drupal
• Experience with Windows and Linux environments

Preferred skills and qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in web design, multimedia design, or related field
• Experience in e-commerce applications and development
• Proven success in project coordination
• Experience in implementing web development workflows and operations using a variety of tools, including GitHub

The ideal candidate is a talented artist who has extensive technical expertise and can work independently or with a team to create, maintain, and update client websites in a variety of industries. Proficiency with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and web applications and services is essential for succeeding in this role. title: Web Developer
description:
Role

We’re looking for an exceptional web developer who is excited to be a technical innovator and hands on developer.  You will work as part of a team to plan, design, and develop functionality ranging from backend enhancements to user-facing and device-specific features. Your role will involve close collaboration with other members of the global Cendyn team to share ideas, problems, and solutions.  

Responsibilities
• Design and implement new functionality on our multi-tenant cloud web platform
• Deliver comprehensive unit tests along with production code
• Conceive of software architecture and technical design
• Write code to build websites and to build and maintain website platforms
• Communicate and collaborate with Cendyn customers and partners as required

Requirements
• Prior experience building and architecting complex web sites involving APIs (REST & GraphQL)
• Passion for web development
• Self-starter that enjoys a fast-paced work environment
• Experience with PHP
•... Experience with Ruby / Ruby on Rails
• Experience with JavaScript, React/Redux, NextJS
• Experience with Jekyll & Liquid
• Minimum of 5 years of programming experience, in web-based technologies
• Familiarity with Git based version control
• Familiarity with object oriented software design methodologies
• Strong organizational, prioritization and communication skills
• Experience with web performance testing and profiling
• Experience designing or implementing web and responsive UI frameworks

Our Technology Stack
• JavaScript, React, NextJS
• Ruby on Rails
• Jekyll
• PHP

EEO Statement

Cendyn provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, Cendyn complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training.

Cendyn expressly prohibits any form of workplace harassment based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, genetic information, disability, or veteran status. Improper interference with the ability of Cendyn’s employees to perform their job duties may result in discipline up to and including discharge.

Other Duties

Please note this job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job. Duties, responsibilities, and activities may change at any time with or without notice

title: Web Developer
description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: India

This offer from "Genworth" has been enriched by Jobgether and got a 72% flex score.

POSITION

Web Services Developer

LOCATION

Genworth India

POSITION SUMMARY

Position will be responsible for developing micro and meshed web services to Genworth’s admin systems, and will be working in an agile team building a unified desktop experience for our customer service representatives. The position reports to the Enterprise Services group, building upon the Java web services platform.

RESPONSIBILITIES
• Lead and/or participate in the analysis and design efforts in support of application and business requirements. Design within the architectural and system strategy constraints.
• Understand and apply accepted application development and integration processes in all development activities. Actively participate in efforts to improve existing processes.
• Work closely with internal business partners to resolve problems and escalate... issues to leadership when necessary.
• Drive improvement to the application architecture, workshop new development patterns
• Ability to stay abreast of emerging technology and integration best practices, and apply those best practices in our environment.

REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS
• Languanges
• Java
• Python
• Go
• 3 Years Professional Experience
• Kubernetes
• Docker
• Web Services, Spring, Spring Boot

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS
• Service API Development
• AWS EC2
• Rancher
• Agile
• Continuous Integration/Deployment
• Git
• JUNIT/Unit Testing
• Splunk
